isValid.summary: Returns true if NPC is still remain loaded in minecraft world

setSkin.summary: Sets name of skin for this NPC. Texture for skin located in following ResourceLocation: `storyanvil_cogwheel:textures/entity/npc/<skinName>.png`

getSkin.summary: Returns name of skin this NPC is using

setName.summary: Changes name of this NPC to provided value

setModel.summary: Changes name of model used by this NPC. Model is located in following ResourceLocation: `storyanvil_cogwheel:geo/<modelName>.geo.json`

getModel.summary: Returns name of model used by this NPC.

chatAction.summary: Makes NPC chat provided text using StoryAction

pathfindAction.summary: Makes npc pathfind to provided coordinates using StoryAction

waitForLabelAction.summary: Makes NPC wait util provided amount of StoryActions with provided label execute. `amount` argument is optional, if not provided only one StoryAction will be needed.

tickAnimationAction.summary: Makes this NPC play animation with provided name for provided amount of ticks using StoryAction.

dialogAction.summary: Makes NPC trigger UI dialog with provided text and photo. `photo` argument is optional, if not provided no photo will be used. Texture for photo located in following ResourceLocation: `storyanvil_cogwheel:textures/dialog/<photo>.png`

dialogChoiceAction.summary: Makes NPC trigger UI question dialog with provided text, photo and answers. First argument is text that NPC will say. Last argument is NPC's photo (use `empty` as photo if you do not want to display a photo). All other CogStrings are answers player can choose from. Returns index of selected answer (starting from zero)
